Feb. 24, 2018 D Valley Entertainment Contest (Fourth Grade Brass)
Valley Entertainment Contest (Fourth Grade Brass) 40 Entertainments Contest Valley Entertainment Contest valley-entertainment-contest-4th-grade-brass
Valley Hotel, Fivemiletown, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, UK Adjudicators: Alan Morrison for music, Frank Sweeney for entertainment In the event of a tie, music mark takes precedence
Most entertaining band: Poyntzpass Silver Band Best march: Poyntzpass Silver Band Best soloist: Nigel Armstrong (trombone, Letterbreen Silver Band)
March 2, 2018, 1 p.m. March 2, 2018, 1:06 p.m.
1 Poyntzpass Silver Band Robert Davidson
2 Letterbreen Silver Band Robert Wilson
